# sale-analysis Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-20

## Active Technologies
- TypeScript 5+ (strict mode), Next.js 16.0.3 with React 19.2.0 + Material-UI v6 (UI components), Mongoose 8.0 (MongoDB ODM), Zod 3.22 (validation), PapaParse 5.4 (CSV), date-fns 4.1 (date handling), react-window 1.8 (virtualization) (002-multi-stage-adaptive-query)
- MongoDB 7+ with Mongoose schema validation (existing Transaction, AISession collections), localStorage for session list persistence (002-multi-stage-adaptive-query)

- TypeScript 5+ (strict mode enabled) + Next.js 16+ (Pages Router), React 19+, Material-UI v6+, Mongoose ODM, Ollama SDK (001-export-goods-analysis)

tests/

## Commands

npm test && npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript 5+ (strict mode enabled): Follow standard conventions
